trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Combat Optimized Martial Personnel And Survival Savant} has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: When the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to Grasslands, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's proficiency bonus is doubled.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: While in darkness, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is {@condition invisible} to any creatures that rely on darkvision to see them in that darkness.

trait.name: Favored Enemy
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) and Intelligence checks to track and recall information about elves and humans.

trait.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has a +1 bonus to initiative. For the first turn of each combat the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's walking speed increases by 10ft, they can make an additional weapon attack and that attack does an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). THE C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has the following ranger spells prepared:

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Combat Optimized Martial Personnel And Survival Savant} has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: While in darkness, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is {@condition invisible} to any creatures that rely on darkvision to see them in that darkness.

trait.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has a +2 bonus to initiative. For the first turn of each combat the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's walking speed increases by 10ft, they can make an additional weapon attack and that attack does an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Sharpshooter
entries: Before making a ranged weapon attack, C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit can choose to take a {@b -5} penalty to the attack roll to add {@b +10} to the attack's damage.

trait.name: Favored Enemy
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) and Intelligence checks to track and recall information about elves, humans and one creature type of your choice.

trait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: When the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to Grasslands or mountains, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's proficiency bonus is doubled.

trait.name: Land's Stride
entries: Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit no extra movement. They can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
In addition the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such those created by the {@spell entangle} spell.

trait.name: Nature's Veil (4/Long Rest)
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit can magically become {@condition invisible}, as a bonus action, until the start of theirr next turn.

trait.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: Once per turns, when the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit misses a weapon attack, they can make another weapon attack as part of the same action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has the following ranger spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit makes two attacks.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Slasher
entries: Once per turn, when the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit deals slashing damage, they can reduce the target's speed by 10 feet until the start of the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit's next turn.
When the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit scores a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls until the start of the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit's next turn.

trait.name: Remarkable Athlete
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can add {@b +2} to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check that doesn't already use their proficiency bonus.
They can cover an additional {@b +5} feet when making a running long jump.

trait.name: Sentinel
entries: Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit even if they take the Disengage action before leaving their reach. When the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit hits a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The {@i Combat Unit Designated as Guardian and Emperor's Legionary} can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can reroll a saving throw that they fail but must use the new roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can use a bonus action to regain 23 ({@damage 1d10 + 18}) HP.

reaction.name: Sentinel
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit makes an attack against another target (without the {@i Sentinel} feat), the C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The {@i Combat Unit Designated as Guardian and Emperor's Legionary} can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can use a bonus action to regain 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) HP.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 1} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blessed Healer
entries: When the {@i Surgical Combat Anti-Lethal Physiology Examination Liason} casts a healing another creature, they regain HP equal to 2 + the spell's level.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Disciple of Life
entries: Whenever S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses a healing spell, the creature regains additional HP equal to 2 + the spell's level.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mace, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Channel Divinity (2/Short Rest))
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Preserve Life}
items.entry: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit restores 65 HP spread among any creatures within 30 ft. of them. Creatures cannot be healed past half of its hit point maximum.

items.name: {@b Turn Undead}
items.entry: Each undead within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit as it can, can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there's nowhere to move.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Blessed Healer
entries: When the {@i Surgical Combat Anti-Lethal Physiology Examination Liasonn} casts a healing another creature, they regain HP equal to 2 + the spell's level.

trait.name: Disciple of Life
entries: Whenever S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses a healing spell, the creature regains additional HP equal to 2 + the spell's level.

action.name: Light Crossbow

headerEntries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Light Crossbow
